text: læa s̄̀wn h̄nụ̀ng cāk s̄ạỵỵāṇ thậngh̄lāy k̄hxng phraxngkh̒ khụ̄x kār mī klāngkhụ̄n læa klāngwạn læa dwng xāthity̒ læa dwng cạnthr̒ phwk cêā xỳā dị̂ s̄uỵū d h̄ı̂ kæ̀ dwng xāthity̒ læa dwng cạnthr̒ tæ̀ cng s̄uỵū d dæ̀ xạllxḥˌ phra p̄hū̂thrng s̄r̂āng phwk mạn h̄āk phwk cêā ca kheārph p̣hạkdī kæ̀ phraxngkh̒ thèānận
